bug.short_desc: Double full stops in algorithm descriptions and steps

long_desc.thetext: - 7.1.6 ToUint32: (Unsigned 32 Bit Integer), step 1 - 7.1.8 ToUint16: (Unsigned 16 Bit Integer), step 1 - 7.1.9 ToInt8: (Signed 8 Bit Integer), step 1 - 7.1.10 ToUint8: (Unsigned 8 Bit Integer), step 1 - 7.1.11 ToUint8Clamp: (Unsigned 8 Bit Integer, Clamped), step 11 - 7.2.8 IsInteger preamble - 7.4.1 GetIterator ( obj, method ), step 1.c - 9.2.4 [[Call]] ( thisArgument, argumentsList), step 10.b.ii.1 - 9.2.14 Function Declaration Instantiation, NOTE - 11.2 White Space, paragraph below Table 30 - 12.2.6.3 Static Semantics: Contains, "PropertyDefinition : MethodDefinition", step 2 - 15.2.0.10 Static Semantics: LexicallyDeclaredNames, "ModuleItem : ExportDeclaration", step 2 - 15.2.1.13 Static Semantics: VarDeclaredNames, See also links - 21.2.2.8.2 Runtime Semantics: Canonicalize Abstract Operation, step 3.c - 21.2.3.3.2 Runtime Semantics: RegExpInitialize Abstract Operation, step 13 - 21.2.5.2.1 Runtime Semantics: RegExpExec Abstract Operation, step 4 - 21.2.5.2.1 Runtime Semantics: RegExpExec Abstract Operation, step 17.b - 25.1.2 The Iterator Interface, NOTE - 25.4.6 Properties of Promise Instances, Table 50, entry for [[PromiseRejectReactions]] - 26.2.3.5 get Reflect.Realm.prototype.stdlib, step 6.1
